name: Invisibles
description:
Invisibles is a video game transposition of ‘Invisible Cities’ from Italian writer Italo Calvino; it is a 3D free roam, third person, puzzle adventure game. In invisibles, you take the role of Polaris, an adventurer from the northern region of Umi, as she finds the long-lost kingdom of Khafiin.

In Khafiin, she meets a mysterious man, who explains the tragedy that befell the kingdom, that killed all its people and made all its cities invisible. The mysterious man then offers to give Polaris the only object capable of resurrecting the cities, in exchange for her to come back to him, and describe the wonders of the cities of Khafiin.

Polaris accepts the offer and embarks on her journey. The first city she finds is Ottavia, the spider-web city. A city suspended between two steep mountains and held together by an immense net.

Play around the city of Octavia as Polaris in this demo version, solve all the puzzles in order to discover what lies behind the huge door in the city’s temple.
